stdout:
Table	Create Table
users	CREATE TABLE `users` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `openId` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
  `name` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `email` varchar(320) DEFAULT NULL,
  `loginMethod` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL,
  `role` enum('user','admin') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'user',
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `lastSignedIn` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `company` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
  `city` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
  `accountStatus` enum('pending','active','trial','suspended') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
  `trialEndsAt` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `mfaRequired` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `mfaEnforcedAt` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `mfaGracePeriodEnd` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_bin AUTO_INCREMENT=12450001
